One obstacle to this I've found is that SSO users do not automatically have an associated HubSpot contact.

If you do have a HubSpot contact, then I wonder if you could trigger a workflow off some contact property.  Potentially even the `hs_analytics_last_url` (Page Last Viewed) property would do.

Hey everyone,
is it possible to limit file sizes for an upload via forms. This upload option will be presented to logged in and registered members (clients) and needs to be limited in size and checked regarding viruses and other malware. Is it a build in functionality for HubSpot forms? If not, is there another way to implement this (the easy way)?
